Margalla Backyard Ultra

Margalla Backyard Ultra (MBU), making history as Pakistan's first-ever Backyard Ultra event. Proudly affiliated with the international association and pioneers of Backyard Ultras worldwide, MBU promises an exhilarating experience like no other. Set in F9 Park in Islamabad, Pakistan, this annual event takes place in the 07 December 2024, inviting runners to test their endurance and spirit. MBU is a project by Margalla Trail Runners.
